node.title: Building On the Rock
node.description: Doug Batchelor grew up in a wealthy home where he could get just about anything his heart desired. In spite of having so much, nothing ever satisfied him. It drove him to a life of drugs, crime, and even the cusp of suicide. It wasn't until Doug ran away from his affluent home at the age of 15 to live in a cave that he found God and discovered true satisfaction.
